content.raw: I updated the `SetWorldPose` arithmetic in c7a082b after some testing with Valkyrie in srcsim, and we should add another test in which the detach link is not the canonical link of the model, and then verify that the detach link pose matches the pose sent to the attach function.
content.html: I updated the SetWorldPose arithmetic in c7a082b after some testing with Valkyrie in srcsim, and we should add another test in which the detach link is not the canonical link of the model, and then verify that the detach link pose matches the pose sent to the attach function.
